entry.title: $2640 // Stunning Brownstone
entry.content:
Available February 15th
2 beds, 1 bath
There are two bedrooms. One is 8 ft 1 in x 11ft; the other is 7 ft 6 in x 11ft.
Gut renovated, sun drenched, large 2BR/1BA apartment.
Amazing brownstone in great location! Close to the A, C train and LIRR, steps
from bustling Nostrand Avenue.
Beautiful eat-in kitchen with Caesar stone countertop, stainless appliances,
dishwasher and microwave.
Other features include:
• High ceilings (11ft)
• Hardwood floors
• Central A/C
• Exposed brick
• Recessed lighting
• Video security system/ Virtual Doorman
• Laundry in the building
Sorry, no dogs.
Rent is $2640. The renter will have an option to pick up the existing lease at
$2640 - which expires on June 30, 2019 - or start a new one with the
management company. No fee!
ABOUT THIS LISTER
I'm listing this for my landlord as we are moving and cannot finish out our lease.
Please reach out to arrange for a personal viewing. My partner and I will be
showing the apartment.
RENTAL REQUIREMENTS
First month and one month security via cashier's check are required to move
in.
